name: Flamenco
description: Traditional Spanish style based around fiery acoustic guitar rhythms, emotional vocals, and accompaniment from traditional percussion and dance.

children.name: Bulería
children.description: Fast flamenco made up of a 12 beat cycle characterized by its vibrant, spontaneous and festive style.

children.name: Flamenco nuevo
children.description: Contemporary style of Flamenco which departs from tradition by incorporating influences from other genres like Jazz, Blues, and Rock.

children.name: Rumba flamenca
children.description: Flamenco subgenre, derived from the exchange of influences between Spain and Latin America.
